text:
Good afternoon Lauren!

I had to really have a think about this one.I’m currently studying at Escape Studios. 

My short term goal include:
-Graduating and getting a job at a small studio where I can be given the freedom to learn a lot more. 
-Really seeing the games project I’m currently working on through to maybe at least pitching it at Transfuser or other investors outside the realm on of the course 
- working on my reel/cv
-working on my social media engagement (particularly LinkedIn/Instagram)
-attending a networking event at least  once a week

My long term goals include:
- gaining experience as an assistant producer 
- working as producer for both a vfx and games project 
- learning the ins and outs of progressing into associate/executive producer/director 
- Working on a Netflix project 

Many thanks
